con:restRequest.con:request: {\r "Addresses" : [\r {\r "AddressId" : "${Call to get Profile Channels specific to Profile#Response#$['Addresses'][0]['AddressId']}",\r "AddressLine1" : "${UpdateProfileChannels#NewAddressLine1}",\r "AddressLine2" : "${UpdateProfileChannels#NewAddressLine2}",\r "AddressLine3" : "",\r "City" : "${UpdateProfileChannels#NewCity}",\r "StateCode" : "${UpdateProfileChannels#NewStateCode}",\r "CountryCode" : "${UpdateProfileChannels#NewCountryCode}",\r "PostalCode" : "${UpdateProfileChannels#PostalCode}",\r "ChannelCode" : "${UpdateProfileChannels#AddressChannelCode}",\r "LocationCode" : "${UpdateProfileChannels#AddressLocationCode}",\r "IsPreferred" : "${UpdateProfileChannels#AddressIsPreferred}",\r "DeliveryStatus" : "${UpdateProfileChannels#AddressDeliveryStatus}",\r "DoNotStandardize" : "${UpdateProfileChannels#DoNotStandardize}",\r "Status" : "A",\r "ProfileOpt": [ { "OptRsnCode" : "${#[RGRUpdateProfile#Get Opt Reasons]#OptReasonCode}",\r "OptType" : "PGM_ADDRSS",\r "OptValue" : "I"\r }, { "OptRsnCode" : "${#[RGRUpdateProfile#Get Opt Reasons]#OptReasonCode}", "OptType" : "${Create a new opt Type#Response#$['OptType']}", "OptValue" : "O" } ] }\r ]\r }
